casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. WAYNE SMITH (AC 17142)

Lavery, Schaller and Sullivan, Js.

Argued March 2 officially released March 24, 1998 Per Curiam.

See Michigan Dept. of State Police v. Sitz, 496 U.S. 444, 110 S. Ct. 2481, 110 L. Ed. 2d 412 (1990); State v. Boisvert, 40 Conn. App. 420, 671 A.2d 834, cert. denied, 237 Conn. 903, 674 A.2d 1332 (1996).

The judgment is affirmed.
